remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例控件。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"按钮"字符串。The "button" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何动态添加向 Web 窗体页的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to dynamically add an control to the Web Forms page. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击 控件时是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 控件后执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下执行页验证时单击控件。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 页验证确定输入的控件是否与全部通过指定验证控件的验证规则页上的验证控件关联。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 你可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时通过单击控件属性。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an control is clicked by using the property. 若要禁止从正在执行的验证，请设置属性设置为`false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 在事件处理程序通常使用此属性事件，以防止页单击取消或重置按钮时进行验证。This property is commonly used in the event handler for the event to prevent page validation from occurring when a Cancel or Reset button is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以防止发生页验证。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 请注意，方法单独激活每个验证的控件。Note that the method activates each validation control independently. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonCausesValidation/CS/htmlbuttoncausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlButtonCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonCausesValidation/VB/htmlbuttoncausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 引发 事件并为生成回发而注册客户端脚本。

span.span: Raises the event and registers client script for generating a postback.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义服务器控件，以便它将始终显示使用粗体文本。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always displays the with bold text. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlbutton_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlbutton_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlbutton_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlbutton_onprerender.vb#2)]

span.span: A that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

summary.span: 这使你可以为事件提供自定义处理程序。

span.span: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时单击控件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此事件会导致出现从客户端到服务器并返回一次往返过程。This event causes a round trip to occur from the client to the server and back. 它是从客户端有意不同`OnClick`事件。It is deliberately different from the client-side `OnClick` event. 如果使用运行的代码之间存在冲突事件和代码由客户端运行`OnClick`事件，服务器端事件的说明将重写客户端代码。If a conflict exists between code run with a event and code run by a client-side `OnClick` event, the server-side event instructions will override the client-side code. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式指定和编写代码的事件处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify and code an event handler for the event. 当单击控件时，会显示在文本框中输入的值。When the control is clicked, the value entered in the text box is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlButton Example/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式指定和编写代码的事件处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically specify and code an event handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlButtonConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonConstructor/CS/htmlbuttonconstructorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlButtonConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonConstructor/VB/htmlbuttonconstructorvb.aspx#1)]

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 当 控件回发到服务器时引发此控件的事件。

span.span: Raises events for the control when it posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可供控件，单击时，引发事件。The method is used by the control, when it is clicked, to raise a event. 如果属性是`true`，则使用的控件中指定的组调用方法属性。If the property is `true`, the method is called using the group of controls specified in the property. 此方法主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的控件。This method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 将 控件的属性呈现到指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control's attributes to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法写入`onclick`属性的呈现控件，然后再调用了基方法。The method writes the `onclick` attribute of the rendered control, and then calls the base method. 方法主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义服务器控件，以便为始终显示标题控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that a title is always displayed for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlbutton_renderattributescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlbutton_renderattributesvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlbutton_renderattributes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlButtonRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlbutton_renderattributes.vb#2)]

summary.span: 当用户单击客户端网页上的某个 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks an control on the client Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时单击控件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此服务器事件会导致出现从客户端到服务器并返回一次往返过程。This server event causes a round trip to occur from the client to the server and back. 它是从客户端有意不同`OnClick`事件。It is deliberately different from the client-side `OnClick` event. 如果使用运行的代码之间存在冲突事件和代码由客户端运行`OnClick`事件，服务器端事件的说明将重写客户端代码。If a conflict exists between code run with a event and code run by a client-side `OnClick` event, the server-side event instructions will override the client-side code. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式指定和编写代码的事件处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify and code an event handler for the event. 当单击控件时，会显示在文本框中输入的值。When the control is clicked, the value entered in the text box is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlButton Example/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlButton Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式指定和编写代码的事件处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically specify and code an event handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlButtonConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonConstructor/CS/htmlbuttonconstructorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlButtonConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonConstructor/VB/htmlbuttonconstructorvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Raises events for the control when it posts back to the server.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在 回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("") indicating that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证组可以分配给特定类别的页面上的验证控件。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组从其他页上的验证组可以独立进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page. 使用属性指定的验证组的名称为其控件回发到服务器时导致验证。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 此属性才起作用时，才的值属性设置为`true`。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 指定的值时属性，只是指定组的一部分的验证控件的验证时控件回发到服务器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果不指定此属性的值和属性设置为`true`，页面上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件时该控件回发到服务器进行都验证。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要验证时的控件控件回发到服务器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls to validate when an control posts back to the server. 页包含用于捕获用户数据的两个文本框和两个控制措施来确保用户未将一个文本框留空。The page contains two text boxes to capture data from the user and two controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 控制的第一个文本框处于`CityInfoGroup`验证组并控制第二个框中为`StateInfoGroup`验证组。The control for the first text box is in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the second box is in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group. 当`CityQueryButton`单击时，只有在控制`CityInfoGroup`验证组进行验证。When the `CityQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group is validated. 当`StateQueryButton`单击时，只有在控制`StateInfoGroup`验证组进行验证。When the `StateQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group is validated. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlButtonValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonValidationGroup/CS/htmlbuttonvalidationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlButtonValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlButtonValidationGroup/VB/htmlbuttonvalidationgroupvb.aspx#1)]
